name: Elation
description:
Story: 

  • A fox wakes up in an abandoned research facility and must find a way out! 
  • On his way, Mr. Fox will have to interact with the environment and go through countless hardships to reach his final destination: the outer world.
  • He will go through the grassland where lizards roam, the taiga forest that the mushroom parasites have taken over, the wetland of death (still in development), and many more.
  • Let the adventure begin!

Features:

  • Nostalgic top-down view pixel art graphic: Take a look back with the good-old graphics style and many skins for you to choose from.
  • 2D action (puzzle) gameplay: There is an easy-to-control movement system with more than 30 levels and boss fights (more will come soon).
  • A mysterious atmosphere: Uncover secrets of the site! The game has a slightly eerie tone to interest platers.
  • Lively soundtrack: the game is packed with sound effects and music to give out the most interactive experience.

Contact:

  • Gmail: company.bigpenguin@gmail.com
  • Twitter: https://twitter.com/BigPeng55262617/
  • Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/user/_BigPenguin/

* Game data is stored on the user's device. Deleting or reloading the application will also delete all data in the game. * 

BigPenguin - 2022
